property.name: Log level when file not found

label.value: Call omar-stager to stage the file in the dated processed dir
Sort files from the ${Base_Unprocessed_Dir} to a dated Processed dir
Do NF processing on MUE data

BigFoot Data Workflow ================================================
-> Data will be taken from a source server/directory
-> This data will be copied into a BigFoot directory/server
-> Unprocessed data will be cataloged/staged in O2
-> Based on file information, the flow will choose which data will be queued for Natural Footprint processing (NFP) Data divided to run through MUE or the Cloud (FOC)
-> The flow will then call a processor to do the NFP
-> Processed data will then be cataloged/staged in O2
Filter data for Natural Footprint processing
Send HTTP post request to stage data
Retrieve data and store on BigFoot
Send HTTP post request to stage data
Do NF processing on FOC data

processGroup.name: Get data from FOC directory after NF processing
processGroup.comment:
Variables to be set: ---------------------------------------------------------- new-filename -> Set this to be the new file name. The current minute and second will be concatenated at the end in the format -> .mm:ss
watch-directory -> Set this to be the directory name which the data will be taken from.
root-directory -> Set this to be the directory name for where the data will be copied.

property.name: Log level when file not found

processGroup.name: Get data from DP/F and store on bigfoot
processGroup.comment:
Variables to be set: ---------------------------------------------------------- new-filename -> Set this to be the new file name. The current minute and second will be concatenated at the end in the format -> .mm:ss
watch-directory -> Set this to be the directory name which the data will be taken from.
root-directory -> Set this to be the directory name for where the data will be copied.

processor.name: Store the Data on BigFoot File System

property.name: Log level when file not found

processor.name: Update the Filename
processor.comment:
Updates the incoming flow files's filename to be new-filename.mm:ss
The new-filename variable can be set in the parent process group.

label.value:
The incoming files are put into the desired directory based on what the root_directory variable is set as. The files are stored as:
/root_directory/year/month/day/hour/filename
List View uses the watch_directory variable to know which directory to watch.

processGroup.name: Get data and filter for NF processing
processGroup.comment:
Variables to be set: ---------------------------------------------------------- new-filename -> Set this to be the new file name. The current minute and second will be concatenated at the end in the format -> .mm:ss
watch-directory -> Set this to be the directory name which the data will be taken from.

property.name: Log level when file not found

processor.name: Dummy Data Filtering
processor.comment:
This processor will be changed to be the necessary processor to select which data to be handled on the MUE or in the CLOUD(FOC).
The future processor will also decide which files will not be sent for natural footprint processing.

label.value: Put into a directory labeled MUE (Mission Unique Equipment)
Put into a directory labeled FOC (Final Operating Capability)
1. Watches a directory 2. Updates the filename with the date 3. Copies the files into a new directory - based on the RouteOnAttribute processor

processGroup.name: HTTP Get and Post for processed file staging
processGroup.comment: Variables to be set: ---------------------------------------------------------- root-directory -> Set this to be the directory name for where the data will be staged.

Max Length To Put In Attribute

label.value: GET HTTP request for the new files and POST HTTP request to stage them.

processGroup.name: HTTP-Get-and-Post-for-file-staging
processGroup.comment: Variables to be set: ---------------------------------------------------------- root-directory -> Set this to be the directory name for where the data will be staged.

processor.name: HTTP Post to Stage Files on Omar

property.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute
Max Length To Put In Attribute

label.value: GET HTTP request for the new files and POST HTTP request to stage them.

processGroup.name: Get data from MUE directory after NF processing
processGroup.comment:
Variables to be set: ---------------------------------------------------------- new-filename -> Set this to be the new file name. The current minute and second will be concatenated at the end in the format -> .mm:ss
watch-directory -> Set this to be the directory name which the data will be taken from.
root-directory -> Set this to be the directory name for where the data will be copied.

property.name: Log level when file not found

processGroup.name: Ingest Images and Delete Unwanted Files
processGroup.comment:
This process group:
- Watches and gets files from a directory - Filters the files based on a set of file extensions - Deletes ALL of the files - Copies the desired files back into the original directory - Moves the desired files into an unprocessed directory - Creates a processed directory sorted by the date - Moves the desired files into the processed directory - Attempts to ingest the files through an HTTP Post

processGroup.name: Filter Ingest Data
processGroup.comment:
This process group:
- Watches and gets files from a directory - Filters the files based on a set of file extensions - Deletes ALL of the files - Copies the desired files back into the original directory - Moves the desired files into an unprocessed directory

processor.name: route files based on file extension
move ingestable files into ingest directory

property.name: Log level when file not found

processGroup.name: Stage Files in Omar Stager
processGroup.comment:
This process group:
- Creates a processed directory sorted by the date - Moves the desired files into the processed directory - Attempts to ingest the files through an HTTP Post

property.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute
Log level when file not found

label.value: Sort files from the ${unprocessed_ingest_directory} to a dated Processed dir
